title: Unexpected
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>I think it would be great if I had an older sister like you, Eli-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh? What’s this all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Actually, I heard about the time when you went out for some bubble drinks with Shizuku-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeh!? W-, what did you hear….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That even though you’re usually reliable and strict, it’s really fun to cut loose with you….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Is that…. so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Emma-san also said something. That if you’re looking at the things you love your eyes sparkle and it’s really cute<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Emma too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>So I thought I want to see that side of you, Eli-san, and go on an adventure together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>….Fufu. Your face is sparkling yourself, Ayumu. If you’re looking at me like that then I guess it can’t be helped. So, let’s go on an adventure shall we<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
